metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44442 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[GIMP PSD File Parsing Heap-based Buffer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44442` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1
gimp-data - 2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1
libgimp2.0 - 2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1').
